text: Saint-Germain-la-Blanche-Herbe () is a commune in the Calvados department in the Normandy region in northwestern France. ==Population== ==See also== * Ardenne Abbey *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== ==External links== * Town council website (in French) Category:Communes of Calvados (department) Category:Calvados communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Saint-Germain-la-Blanche-Herbe
